de.dfki.embots.framework.ui.eyetracking
Interface GazeStrategy

All Known Implementing Classes:
DominantGazeStrategy, ShyGazeStrategy
public interface GazeStrategy

Implement this interface for defining which gaze behavior will be used in which state.
